cards.title: Guided in the Unknown
cards.note: God directs those who trust Him and ask for wisdom. Take the next obedient step; He will make the path straight.
cards.prayer: Lord, I trust You with what I can’t see. Give me wisdom for today and steady my steps. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pray Proverbs 3:5–6 and write one concrete step for today.

cards.title: Gethsemane God
cards.note: Jesus understands intense suffering. Pour out your heart; the Spirit helps when words fail.
cards.prayer: Man of Sorrows, meet me in this pain. Strengthen me to endure and to hope in You. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pray honestly for 5 minutes; if words fail, sit in silence before God.

cards.title: Never Alone
cards.note: God places the lonely in families. Seek connection and remember His presence with you.
cards.prayer: Father, draw me into Your family and near friends who love You. Remind me You are with me. Amen.
cards.next_step: Text one believer and ask to meet or pray this week.

cards.title: Secure in His Care
cards.note: Security grows when our fear is re-anchored in God’s power and love.
cards.prayer: Lord, fix my heart on Your steadfast love. Guard my mind with Your peace. Amen.
cards.next_step: Memorize Isaiah 26:3 and recite it when anxious thoughts rise.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Confidence in God'.

cards.title: He Hears in Distress
cards.note: God is a present help. Cry out; you are pressed but not crushed in Christ.
cards.prayer: God, hear my cry. Be my refuge and strength right now. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pray Psalm 46 aloud; breathe slowly after each line.

cards.title: Filled in Christ
cards.note: Apart from God everything proves empty. Christ alone satisfies and gives joy in His presence.
cards.prayer: Jesus, You are the bread of life. Satisfy my soul with Your presence and truth. Amen.
cards.next_step: Fast one meal to pray Isaiah 55:1–2; then read John 6:35.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Living Water' or 'Bread of Life'.

cards.title: Zeal for the Lord
cards.note: Fan into flame holy zeal—earnest love, diligent work, and focus on Christ’s mission.
cards.prayer: Lord, ignite my heart with love for You and others. Channel my energy toward Your will. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pick one service you can do this week ‘unto the Lord’.

cards.title: Joy Made Full
cards.note: Joy in Christ is sturdy—rooted in His presence and promises, not circumstances.
cards.prayer: God of hope, fill me with joy and peace in believing. Amen.
cards.next_step: Write 3 evidences of God’s grace today; thank Him aloud.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Joy in the Lord'.

cards.title: Overcome Evil with Good
cards.note: Hatred kills. Jesus calls us to love, pray, and do good to enemies.
cards.prayer: Lord Jesus, uproot hate from my heart. Teach me to love and bless even my enemies. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pray by name for the person you resent; ask God for one kind action.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Love Your Enemies'.

cards.title: Taste and See
cards.note: God’s goodness pursues us; His Spirit forms goodness in us for good works.
cards.prayer: Father, let Your goodness shape my character and deeds. Amen.
cards.next_step: Do one hidden act of kindness today—no credit.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Fruit of the Spirit'.

cards.title: Strength Under Control
cards.note: Gentleness is Spirit-powered strength that restores and persuades with grace.
cards.prayer: Lord, make my words soft and my convictions steady. Amen.
cards.next_step: Before a tough conversation, pray 2 Timothy 2:24–25.

cards.title: He Knows My Anguish
cards.note: God sees your anguish and comforts to make you a comforter to others.
cards.prayer: God of all comfort, draw near and lighten my distresses. Amen.
cards.next_step: Write a lament (What? Why? Yet I will trust…).

cards.title: Hope Against Despair
cards.note: When you feel crushed, preach hope to your soul—wait on the Lord who renews strength.
cards.prayer: Lord, lift my eyes to Your steadfast love; renew my strength. Amen.
cards.next_step: Repeat Psalm 42:5 three times as a prayer; go for a short walk.

cards.title: Free Indeed
cards.note: In Christ, you are not destined for bondage. Replace enslaving habits with Spirit-led practices and support.
cards.prayer: Jesus, set me free and fill me with new desires. Surround me with wise, honest companions. Amen.
cards.next_step: Tell a trusted believer; set one practical boundary today.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Freedom in Christ'.

cards.title: All Have Sinned—Grace Abounds
cards.note: Sin is universal and deadly, but God’s grace in Christ is greater and available to all who repent and believe.
cards.prayer: Merciful God, thank You for the cross. Wash me and lead me in righteousness. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pray 1 John 1:9; if needed, confess to a mature believer (James 5:16).

cards.title: Transgressions Removed
cards.note: God bears our iniquity in the Servant; He casts sins into the depths and abounds in steadfast love.
cards.prayer: Compassionate Lord, thank You for carrying my iniquity. Teach me to walk in Your ways. Amen.
cards.next_step: Meditate on Micah 7:19; thank God for His mercy.

cards.title: Have Mercy on Me, O God
cards.note: Honest confession brings mercy; in Christ the record of debt is nailed to the cross.
cards.prayer: Create in me a clean heart, O God. Restore to me the joy of Your salvation. Amen.
cards.next_step: Pray Psalm 51 slowly; write a specific confession.

cards.title: Tears that God Will Wipe Away
cards.note: God meets us in sorrow and promises lasting joy. Let sorrow lead to repentance where needed and to hope in Christ.
cards.prayer: Father, hold me in my sorrow and lead me into Your joy. Amen.
cards.next_step: Share one sorrow with a trusted friend and pray together.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Joy Comes in the Morning'.

cards.title: Life’s True Meaning
cards.note: We were made to know God, love Him and others, and walk in the good works He prepared.
cards.prayer: Eternal God, center my life on knowing You and loving others. Amen.
cards.next_step: Ask: How can I love God and neighbor in my next decision? Do one small act today.
cards.ubf_source_hint: Search UBF Resources for 'Purpose' or 'Great Commandment'.
